column4: I have some problem getting an ATI Radeon X1600 to work... System is 10.04, Updates are installed. I also installed xserver-xorg-video-radeonhd - but it seems like that it is not used. The graphics performance is very bad, even if I disable all desktop effects
I also can't switch the drivers because there is no xorg.conf present
have you checked the X wiki to make sure the open source drivers support your card?
sorry, can't help you - I use fglrx
